extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bounces
      The total amount of times the pacman has touched a wall or another pacman
      private boolean caught
      The flag to know whether a pacman has been caught or not

      The attribute represents the direction where the pacman is moving

      The attribute represents the radius of the pacman

      The constant indicates the upward movement

      The attribute represents the speed of the pacman

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pacman

        public Pacman(int radius,
              int posX,
              int posY,
              int waitingTime,
              java.lang.String direction,
              int bounces,
              boolean caught)
        The constructor allows to create a new pacman with the specified characteristics
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius that the pacman will have
        posX - The x coordinate of the pacman
        posY - The y coordinate of the pacman
        waitingTime - The speed of the pacman
        direction - The initial direction of the pacman
        bounces - The bounces that the pacman starts with
        caught - Whether a pacman has been caught or not
